page.title: 16Interview
page.content:
Rachel is handicapped and lives at Thomas Delarue School.She is in a wheelchair.Rachel came when she was ten and is now sixteen.Soon she will leave to go to Coventry.Rachel lives in a flat in the school premises and comes up to school for lessons.She finds it difficult to open cupboards because she can not reach the handle. Rachel is a very musical girl and is just as clever as any normal child.She can not take practical music exams because her hands are stiff but has done Grade 5 theory.She writes but finds it quicker with a type writer.Rachel has difficulty with her speech as she stutters dreadfully but she is a very happy girl.
Caroline
